Privacy.title: Pol√≠tica de privacidad
Privacy.content:
## Responsible Entity 

Luna News, operated by Alberto Luna, committed to protecting your privacy, issues this Privacy Notice in accordance with the Federal Law on the Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties. 

## Personal Data We Collect 

Currently, we only collect users' language preferences. 

No other personal data is collected on our site. 

## Purpose of Data Processing 

The collected language preferences are used solely by neongeeksofficial to configure and personalize the content language on our site, in order to provide a better user experience. 

## Use of Information 

The information regarding language preferences is used exclusively within the same site and is not shared with third parties. 

## ARCO Rights 

Users have the right to access, rectify, cancel, or oppose the processing of their personal data (ARCO Rights). 

To exercise these rights, you can contact us. 

## Changes to the Privacy Notice 

This Privacy Notice may undergo modifications, changes, or updates due to new legal requirements, our own needs, our privacy practices, or other causes. We commit to keeping you informed about any changes to this notice through our website. 

### Last updated: *30-07-2024* 

--- 

**Luna News**

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsAndConditions.content:
## Terms and Conditions 

### 1. Website Name 

This website, **Luna Digital**, is operated and managed with the purpose of providing our users with the most relevant news in the technological world. 

### 2. Purpose of the Site 

The primary objective of Luna Digital is to publish informative and educational content related to the latest innovations and advancements in technology. 

### 3. Prohibitions 

Plagiarism and any attempts to steal content are strictly prohibited. All users accessing this site must refrain from copying, reproducing, distributing, or otherwise using the content without the express authorization of the owners of Luna Digital. 

### 4. Requirements to Access the Site 

Access to this site is intended exclusively for users who enjoy the provided content and do not take opinions or information personally. Using the site implies acceptance of these terms and conditions. 

### 5. Use and Consultation of the Site 

Currently, the use and consultation of the Luna Digital website are entirely free of charge. However, we reserve the right to modify this policy in the future, with prior notification to our users. 

### 6. Prohibited Activities 

Using this website for illegal, harmful activities or those that may harm other users is prohibited. This includes, but is not limited to, harassment, spreading computer viruses, and any other malicious behavior. 

### 7. Ownership of Content 

Luna Digital is the exclusive owner of all content and materials published on this website. Any unauthorized use of these materials will be considered a violation of our intellectual property rights. 

### 8. Responsibility for External Sites 

Luna Digital is not responsible for the content, accuracy, or privacy policies of external websites that may be linked to our site. The inclusion of any link does not imply approval or endorsement by Luna Digital. 

### 9. Modifications to the Terms and Conditions 

Luna Digital reserves the right to make changes to these terms and conditions at any time. Any modifications will be communicated to users through our website. 

--- 

**Luna Digital**

subtitle.p3: NEWS you will find the most recent and relevant news of the tech world

About.content:
Luna News is a digital news portal dedicated to providing accurate, relevant, and timely information to our audience. We work tirelessly to bring you the latest updates on a wide variety of topics, including:

## Sections

- **Latest:** Coverage of the latest tech news from around the world.
- **Tutorials:** Practical guides and tips on technology, software, and more.
- **PCs & Laptops:** News and analysis of the latest updates in computers and laptops.
- **Mobiles & Tablets:** News and analysis on the latest mobile devices and tablets.
- **Technology:** Updates on the latest trends and advancements in the world of technology and gadgets.
- **Gaming:** Comprehensive coverage of events and news in the world of video games and digital entertainment.
- **Programming:** News and resources on software development, programming languages, and more.
- **Reviews:** Critiques and opinions on products, services, and trends in various fields.
- **AI:** News and developments in the field of artificial intelligence and its impact on various industries.

## Our Values

- **Objectivity:** We strive to present news impartially, without political or religious influence.
- **Accuracy:** We meticulously verify all the information we publish to ensure its accuracy and reliability.
- **Relevance:** We focus on news that is important to our audience and impacts their lives.
- **Timeliness:** We stay updated with the latest news and deliver it to our readers as quickly as possible.
- **Analysis:** We offer in-depth analysis and expert perspectives on current events from a professional approach.
- **Commitment:** We are dedicated to providing our audience with an engaging and valuable informative experience.

---
## Mission

Luna News is more than just a news website. We are a community passionate about staying informed and engaged with the world around us.

*We invite you to join our community and immerse yourself in a world of knowledge.*
